title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not show up in the Available Items section.
EB:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Expand the Data Source section by clicking the related icon.
2. Expected Result: The table icons and column icons should show up.
3. Actual Result: The column icons do not show up.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Expand the Data Source section.
4. Verify that the column icons are not visible.
